translation: Arjuna said, "What are the marks of one who has transcended the three qualities, O Lord? What is their conduct, and how do they go beyond these three qualities?"
commentary: 14.21 Kaih by what? Lingaih by marks? Three three? Gunan Gunas? Etan these? Past crossed? becomes becomes? Lord O Lord? What (is his) conduct? How how? f and? Etan these? Three three? Gunan Gunas? Ativartate goes beyond.Commentary Arjuna said O Lord? by what characteristics may a man be recognized as having gone beyond the three alities What is the behavior of that Trigunatita sage (one
